then.line: Oh no!
Oh no?!
I think this means... you were born in a time of a great cataclysm.
Cataclysm? Oh no is right! I don't know how I feel about that. Hopefully the next card's a little brighter.
How about you draw this one for me? I think I've got bad luck.
Okay...
Uh oh.
Is that... DEATH?!
Wait, let's not freak out just yet. Death can mean lots of things! Doesn't have to be DEATH-Death!
Well what does it mean?!
Oh! Star. Like....Starfish. I think this means you were born...at sea.
What--Prota.... How did you know?!
My parents love to tell the story of how I was born a couple weeks early, on a cruise ship!
Apparently they already had my named picked out and ready... "Smooth Phil!"
But...
But then they looked into the water and there... was a sea urchin. Hence, my name.
That's why you're called Spiky Jon?
Yep! That's the entire reason! Now come on, you've got me excited. What's my next card?
Hmmm... Uh oh.
It's the DEATH card.
Uh oh is right! What's that supposed to mean?!
It means you were born to be a star!
A star?! Me?!
Yep! What else would it mean? You're destined for fame, Spiky Jon!
Hmmm... But then...
What's up?
Well, I was just thinking. We're asking about my past, but you're telling me I'm destined for something in the future.
Which means that the outcome of my life is fixed, decided by the circumstances of my birth.
And that suggests a kind of... almost biological form or pre-determinism that, if true, undermines every notion of free will!
Uh... oops?
I picked a fine day to come to the Pickle Yard, huh? Or... did I pick it at all?
Speaking of picking, I picked you a new card! It's...
The DEATH card?! Oh no. What does that mean?!
